roles.roleHeading: 3DExperience SOLIDWORKS Drafting & MBD Software Engineering Manager
roleDesc: Developing a full-stack web application for technical drawings and 3D annotations of CAD models, enabling engineers to transition from traditional 2D blueprints to digital design workflows.
Building a highly interactive UI with an Angular frontend, and a high-performance C++ backend, and utilizing WebGL and Three.js for real-time 3D rendering.
Tech Stack: C++ 20, JavaScript, TypeScript, Three.js, WebGL, Docker, Git, GitLab, Jenkins, Jasmine
Designed and optimized geometric computation algorithms to enhance fluid dynamics performance in computational fluid dynamics (CFD) workflows.
Developed tools for detecting conformal contacts and transforming non-conformal contacts into conformal ones, enabling better handling of complex CAD geometries.
Improved mesh quality by designing offsetting algorithms for CAD assemblies and refining outputs from Boolean operations.
Reduced processing time by 75% through multithreading-based parallelization techniques and algorithm optimizations.
Developed native simulation software features for Linux and Windows using C++ (backend) and Qt (frontend).
Technologies and Tools: C++, Qt, SVN, Computational Geometry
Developed surface modeling and mesh processing algorithms for proximity detection, connection establishment, and mesh editing, enabling accurate simulation of welds, rivets, and fasteners.
Designed and implemented robust algorithms to compare meshes of two CAD models for regression testing based on key geometric parameters.
Enhanced mesh preprocessing workflows by optimizing algorithms for structural analysis and manufacturing simulations.
Technologies and Tools: C++, Perforce, Jenkins
